When you buy an NFT scratch card, you get a chance to win up to $1,000,000 or participate in the MR.Gain airdrop. There's no limit to the number of scratch cards you can buy, and you can also resell them to generate profits.

The Token

The Gain Token is a utility token thatallows you to create and manage yourown custom lotteries. With the GainToken, you can:

  • Reward your followers and fans with exclusive content, cash prizes, NFTs, and more.
  • Monetize your traffic and generate revenue from your audience.
  • Build a community around your brand or interest.

Monetize Your Traffic:

  • 1

    PurchaseGain Tokens

  • 2

    Createa lottery

  • 3

    Set the prizes,rules, and ticketprice

  • 4

    Promote your lottery to your audience

  • 5

    Invitesponsors toyour lottery

  • 6

    Distribute prizes to the winners
